content:
Jim Whitehead

ejw@cs.ucsc.edu

Dept. of Computer Science
University of California, Santa Cruz
1156 High Street, SOE3
Santa Cruz, CA 95064
(831) 459-1227

Jim is an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at the University of California, Santa Cruz, where he performs research in the fields of software configuration management, hypertext versioning, and remote collaborative authoring.

Go to Jim's home page at UC Santa Cruz.

Jim graduated from UC Irvine in September, 2000, completing his dissertation work under his advisor, Professor Richard Taylor.
